title: Sound On: Debt Vote, SALT Deduction
itunes:title: Sound On: Debt Vote, SALT Deduction
description:
Bloomberg Government reporters Emily Wilkins and Jack Fitzpatrick co-hosted the show.

Guests: New Jersey Congressman Josh Gottheimer, American Action Forum Director of Fiscal Policy, Gordon Gray, Amy Tarkanian, Republican Strategist and former Nevada state GOP chairwoman and Bloomberg Politics Contributor Jeanne Sheehan Zaino.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
